dialogue: customer: neither my iPhone nor my Apple Watch are recording my steps/activity, and Health doesn‚Äôt recognise either source anymore for some reason. Any ideas?  customer: please read the above. support: Let‚Äôs investigate this together. To start, can you tell us the software versions your iPhone and Apple Watch are running currently? customer: My iPhone is on 11.1.2, and my watch is on 4.1. support: Thank you. Have you tried restarting both devices since this started happening? customer: I‚Äôve restarted both, also un-paired then re-paired the watch. support: Got it. When did you first notice that the two devices were not talking to each other. Do the two devices communicate through other apps such as Messages? customer: Yes, everything seems fine, it‚Äôs just Health and activity. support: Let‚Äôs move to DM and look into this a bit more. When reaching out in DM, let us know when this first started happening please. For example, did it start after an update or after installing a certain app?
summary: Customer enquired about his Iphone and Apple watch which is not showing his any steps/activity and health activities. Agent is asking to move to DM and look into it.

dialogue: customer: hi team! i m planning to get Apple AirPods ! it shows on the website it has 10 days replacement warranty, can u explain me what is it ? support: We've a 10days replacement policy if the item you received is damaged or defective. ^SH customer: Ok ! But what if i didn‚Äôt like the product and want to return it support: We wouldn't be able to accept the remorse returns. For more information on mobile returns policy. Kindly click on the link shared here:  Appreciate your understanding. ^VN customer: Ok thanks ! But these are earphones so does it mean same policy apply for these as well support: Yes, headsets/ earphones are not eligible for remorse returns. In case of any damage/ defect you can reach out to us, we'll check and help you accordingly. ^VN customer: Oh ok ! Thanks for the help ! Much appreciated :) support: Thanks to you too for understanding. Do keep us posted for any further concerns. We'll be happy to help. üòä ^VN
summary: Customer is eager to know about the replacement policy on the earphones he wishes to buy. Agent stated that it only applies if the received item is defective or damaged.

dialogue: customer:  Wow, expected 4 packages yesterday, but only 2 showed up. 50% failure rate-not impressed. dialogue: customer: absolutely appalled by the fact that Tesco don‚Äôt believe that 90% girls shoes and 10% boys is not sexism! Are boys not entitled to dry warm feet same as girls? Ty - Marian 2/2 customer: the manager said it was an HQ issue not store so please explain?! Everything from the brown shoes on the left to the far right are girls. Please explain why? I'm sorry you feel this way, I appreciate your frustration. We flex our space, and range, to support customer needs and perennial trends. We manage stock to each store to ensure we are giving a balanced offer. 1/2 customer: So you‚Äôre saying girls needed a choice of over 10 boots & 8 trainers and 10 shoes boys only need one pair of boots and no shoes or trainers? Because that‚Äôs what your advertising. It is sexism & appalling of you to do this! Boys require clothes & choice just as much as girls! customer: It in no way is balanced! Please provide me details to take this issue further? I cannot believe your bias to girls over boys. No explanation other than your wish for ¬£¬£¬£! How is that not discrimination and sexism? Boys not allowed choice cause they‚Äôre boys?!  support: Hi Lucinda. I assure you this is not discriminating. There is just a much higher demand for female footwear than male footwear in our stores. 1/3 support: Due to this big difference in demand we offer more female footwear as that is what our customers are more interested in investing in. 2/3 support: This decision is down to our customers choices, and we try to change and improve to our customers needs and wants. :) Thanks, Calum 3/3 customer: You offer one pair to boys! You refuse to listen to your customers choices and are dictating to society what you think not giving us the option to choose for ourselves! Do you just buy the first & only shoes you see or do you look at options?!

dialogue: customer: how long is it before you contact someone who's  taken my bag by mistake. I've got a lost luggage ref number. Got told today that a similar bag got left so that's who probably has mine. I've got the majority of my clothes in it and want them back asap. support: We're sorry, Dan. If we delivered your bag to the carousel and someone else picked it up we're not responsible for contacting them on your behalf. However, if there's been a bag left behind we'll do all we can to get in touch with that customer for them to retrieve it. ^Julie customer: When I spoke to BA on the phone earlier they said there had been a bag left behind that is similar. They said you can't return theirs until mine has been returned. It's a bit annoying that you can't contact them and enquire if they have mine by mistake. What are my options? support: Hi Dan, I can appreciate your frustration. Unfortunately, we're unable to do anything until your bag has been returned, as you already know. You could contact the police and report your bag as stolen, or file a lost bag claim with your travel insurance company. ^Linds customer: So people can just get off your flights and take whatever baggage they want? great that is!! You literally have to ring up one person and you won't, I'll not be using BA again in a hurry! support: Hi Dan. As soon as the passenger who has collected your bag gets back in touch with us, we'll have more information. I'm sorry we're unable to assist further. ^Kev customer: Thanks Kev how long do I need to leave it before putting a claim in with you or the insurance? support: Hi Dan. If another passenger has your bag, you wouldn't be able to make a claim with us. You may be able to claim through your insurance so you may want to contact them. ^Kev customer: So is there absolutely no possibility that you can contact the person who's bag was left and ask. Obviously I would but you wouldn't be able to give me their details. I've got presents etc in the bag and no money to replace them now, so it's essentially ruined my Christmas. support: We wouldn't be able to give you their details for data protection reasons, Dan. We can't guarantee we can do anything, as your bag arrived on the carousel. However, please DM us your baggage ref, email and postal address. ^Leanne customer: Hi Leanne I've sent the message thanks Dan
summary: Someone else has taken their bag after a flight and left their own similar case and wants to know when BA will contact the customer, also asks when they can make an insurance claim. Says that BA will not take any steps to contact the person to return the mistaken bag and that the customer could contact the police and report their bag stolen.

^HSB

dialogue: customer: the 2120 Salisbury train from Waterloo. Not really getting much info guys.... customer: So it was incorrectly coupled?? Really???? Your driver decoupled and recoupled it and the doors "magically worked". Serious breach in protocol there guys. Playing with safety because previous driver wanted to clock out. support: On occasion the electrical contacts that the trains use to pass communications for door controls, power and brake, information systems, etc will not make contact properly. In these cases, detaching and reattaching is the approved process taken in line with our fleet 1/3 support: team's fault-finding instructions, and done under the instruction of maintenance staff and the fleet control manager. The train's fail-safe systems would not allow it to move in this situation, and if we could not resolve the problem, the train would be taken out of service. 2/3 support: Safety is, and always will be, our first priority, and in this case protocols were followed correctly. Our fleet team will investigate using on-board monitoring systems as to what when wrong in this case and take appropriate action. ^DB 3/3 customer: So wait a second. Once a driver couples the train it's not protocol to test immediately, but to wait until the carriages are full of passengers to then couple? That's your statement? support: On more modern stock the train will undertake the necessary tests to confirm. With older trains, there is a "pull-away" test to confirm the trains are physically coupled together, but it is not always immediately apparent that the all of the 100+ contacts on the train 1/3 support: type in question are making suitable contact. Any one of these pins not making proper contact can result in the train not being able to move as part of fail-safe systems built in. As mentioned, more modern trains such as our 450 and 444 types have computer systems on board 2/3 support: which test each signal passing through the contacts to confirm that the train is attached both physically and electronically. ^DB 3/3 customer: Whilst I'm still shocked, I appreciate the fullness of the answer! :) support: No worries - I'm ex train-crew, so this is rather my specialist topic! Appreciate that it seems a little antiquated, but it's all vetted and okayed by the safety bodies. It's similar to the modern trains, where resolving problems can often come down to turning off the 1/2 support: train's management systems and turning them back on again! ^DB 2/2 customer: Ahh that makes sense, thought the response was a little more detailed than usual. As a regular passenger I like understanding more, helps me to work around problems and know when to make alternative plans. It's amazing how often turning it off and on again actually works support: I always try to give something a bit more detailed, running a railway often has a lot more to it than it appears (I was recently conversing with  about emissions standards, which was an interesting research topic). Benefits of 6 years experience though! ^DB customer: Keep up the good work!
summary: Customer is asking that salisbury train from waterloo. Agent updated that he was giving information more detailed, running a railway often gas a lot more to it than it appears.

dialogue: customer: reception and customer service lack but they do offer some pretty cool benefits. They don‚Äôt make up for the terrible customer service I receive 90% of the time when I call nor the fact that I rarely have reception.... but they‚Äôre pretty cool! customer: And let‚Äôs not forget that I can‚Äôt talk on the phone and browse the web or use any apps unless I‚Äôm on WiFi but I could in 2012.....  I don‚Äôt understand the regression support: Hey Tamisha! We do understand how you feel! Simultaneous Voice and Data on a phone is available when connected to Wi-Fi, and at times on Sprint's data network with devices that have Calling Plus capability (also called LTE Calling which allows calls -CO support: to go over the Sprint LTE network). Some Android devices have this such as LG G6, Stylo 3 (LS-777), V3, X charge and Samsung Galaxy‚ó¶J7 Perx (SM-J727P), Note 8, S8 and S8+.  Phones have a single-radio and does not have the capability to use data on -CO support: the LTE network while on a voice call. A single radio better supports the new Sprint LTE Plus network, and preserves device battery life. When connected to Wi-Fi, customers can make calls and access data. -CO support: Please let us know if you have any more questions. We are here working for you. Thank you for reaching out to us. Thank you for choosing Sprint. -CO customer: I love how you completely ignored the statement about your terrible customer service and reception. support: Oh no! We don't want you feeling this way. While some experiences may seem less than, we are here working to ensure every customer has a positive experience with Sprint. Kindly send us a direct message. Please lets know what makes you feel this way about us. -CO
summary: Customer is complaining that reception and customer service lack. Agent updated that when connected to wifi customers will make calls and access data.

dialogue:
customer: obvious why   a , T5 completely DEAD, more staff then passengers,  terrible customer service, & still can't get on my plane even though it was not due to leave for 50min.
    support: Hi Thamin, if you arrived after check-in for your flight had closed we wouldn't be able to accept you for the flight. Even if the airport is quiet, check in times still need to be met. ^Natalie customer: Natalie I was 5min late. Plane wasn't expected to leave for 55min, airport was empty, pretty sure security would be too, (would guess the plane was too)I'm confident I could have made it to the gate with ample time, with just a tiny bit of your help. support: Hi Thamin, I'm afraid this isn't something we can offer any flexibility with. It's not possible to check in for a flight after check in closes, as the system doesn't allow it. Late arrivals can cause flight delays and we apply the same policy to everyone, not just when it's 1/2 support: busy. I can understand your disappointment, but it's your responsibility to arrive at the airport in good time and complete check in before it closes. ^Beth S. 2/2 customer: Just for clarification ü§î- so you never allow anyone and have allowed in the past people that are late for checkin? Could you kindly direct me to this policy too please. customer: And are you sure Beth that the system does not allow you to do late check-ins? support: We're sorry, Thamim. If you follow this link, it does advise you  Click check in essentials. It is your responsibility to arrive at the airport with enough time. ^Pip customer: You've not answered all my questions - I take my responsibility for being 5min late, but your staff could have easily (assessed it's not busy and) check me in. support: We appreciate the points you've raised, Thamim. However, once check in has been closed, we're unable to reopen a passenger list. We hope you understand we have to be fair and consistent with all of our passengers. 1/2 support: This means our staff wouldn't have been able to make an exception when you travelled. We hope this message helps to clarify our position. 2/2 ^DaniH customer: Thank you for the response- but it doesn't suffice and is unacceptable, you're flights are always delayed and customers get no compensation. You also make different exceptions for different people it seems support: EU compensation depends on the reason for a delay or cancellation, Thamim. Not all flights are eligible as not all reasons are under our control. We're sorry you remain disappointed, however, as previously advised it's your responsibility to make sure you arrive at the 1/2 support: airport and check in, in time for your flight. We're unable to hold a flight for a passenger if they are late. Our position remains unchanged. ^Natalie 2/2 customer: Natalie - do me favour, let's quantify this: how long on average it takes to get from checkin desk to the furthest boarding gates at T5? customer: And for the record I wasn't asking you to hold a flight, the plane wasn't due to leave for 50min (and it was still delayed by 20min) support: Hi Thamin. It can depend on a lot of factors.  We appreciate you may not have been asking to hold the flight. If you're late to check in, there isn't any way for you to make the flight, even if the flight is delayed. We're sorry you remain disappointed with our response. ^Paul
summary: The customer says that he would have been allowed for check in since he was delayed by only 5 minutes. The agent replies that any customer wouldn't be allowed for check-ins if arrived after check in is closed and it applies to all of their customers.

dialogue: customer: to qualify for 2018 status - can I spend money in 2017 for travel in 2018? Trying to hit my MQDs by end of year. support: Hi, there. Unfortunately, MQM and MQD credit is added to your account once the flights are completely flown. *CTR customer: Ok can I book for others? support: Of course! However, with the tickets you book for others, you will not earn the MQDs or MQMs for their tickets when they fly. *TBW customer: So then not of course? I need to hit MQDs for 2017. The only way to do that is book and fly myself by 12/31/17? support: You could purchase the tickets on your Platinum Delta SkyMiles American Express credit card to reach the MQD waiver. *TBW customer: I'm confused.Someone I spoke with on the phone gave me conflicting info. Can you  confirm to hit status I need to hit MQD threshold by (1/2) customer: Spending and personally traveling by 12/31/17? Is that correct? support: That is one way of hitting the status. The other way is to spend $25,000 on your Delta Amex within the calendar year. *TBW
summary: Customer is questioning can they spend money in 2017 for the travel in 2018 to qualify the 2018 status and trying to hit their MQD's by the end of the year. Agent updates that they can purchase the tickets on their platinum delta sky miles american express credit card to reach the MQD waiver and the other way is to spend $25000 on thei delta amex within end of the year.

dialogue: customer: I was wanting to look into possibly upgrading my seat (GINX36) but the seating chart says 1st class and delta comfort are all gone. That's impossible. support: Hi Freddie, thanks for contacting us.  My apologies for the inconvenience.  One moment while I look into this further.   *HML support: Thanks for your patience.  I'm showing First Class is sold out for your flights; however, Delta Comfort + is available.  The Delta Comfort + cabin is sold as a fare for this market; therefore, in order to confirm Comfort + there will be a difference in the fare.   *HML customer: What does this upgrade list mean?  customer: And this one for the first leg of the flight?  support: It looks like there may an error between our system and the app.  I'm checking into this now.   *HML customer: ive heard about airlines blocking out seats for the purpose of overbooking and juggling to squeeze profits. I didnt know you guys were still doing that or doing it period support: Thanks for your patience.   I am showing seats available in First Class; however, the lower First Class fares are not available.  Once your reservation is changed to the First Class cabin, you will be able to view and assign seats.   *HML support: You may see more availability closer to the time of travel.    *HML customer: This explanation sounds very convoluted. 1st there was no seats available, now there are seats, but there are no more lower 1st class fares available? What's does that mean and how do I upgrade seats. That's the whole reason I tweeted you. Cmon Delta aka *HML support: Freddie, in order upgrade your ticket to First Class, you must pay the difference in the fare.  In reviewing your ticket, you have no value left to apply towards the cost of the ticket to upgrade.  *HML support: If you're using miles to upgrade, the cost is 35,000 miles each way and you must be booked in a L, U, or T class fare.   *HML customer: What do mean I must pay the difference but then say I have no value left in my ticket? Why not just tell me how much it is to upgrade like I've been asking from the beginning? What does it mean I have no value in a tix I purchased? support: To make changes to your reservation there is a change fee of $200.00.  Your ticket is less than the change fee; therefore, there is no value in your ticket.   I can provide an estimated cost to change your ticket; however, this does not include taxes and fees.   *HML support: The estimated cost is $1,500.00 for First Class on your flight from EWR to GCM.  This does not include taxes and airport fees and fares are not guaranteed until purchased.  Please contact our International Reservation specialist at 1-800-241-4141.   *HML
summary: Customer is complaining about the inconvenience of unavailable first class seats and asking is there no value of purchased tix. Agent informed that customer has no value remain to apply for first class and further informed about the service charges amount and said that comfort+ seats are available.

Did you have the black or white unit? ^JRA customer: White unit. System light did not go off. customer:   support: Thank you, that would indicate a reboot. If services are not back sign in with your credentials to check for outages at  We will be here if you require further support.  ^JRA

Agent telling that internet and tv are down right now and we will try to reset battery backup unit  which will trigger a reset to main network terminal  if the services not back sign  in with your credentials  check outages at this url.

dialogue:
customer: 
U changed my flight, I lose boarding position A to C & wouldn't let me $ for priority boarding during check in!  support: Mike, in these situations, we're only able to issue the next available boarding position. Did you discuss Upgraded Boarding @ the Gate? ^CT customer: I did but was told they just sold the last position right before me. I ask to purchase it when I was checking my bag and was told I couldn't support: Sorry for the trouble, Mike. Upgraded Boarding is popular & sells out fast. Fingers crossed for next time; see you onboard! ^SH customer: Why are we not allowed to upgrade our positron at the time of the change during luggage check in? support: Because we allow Passengers to easily make changes to reservations, we don't have an accurate count until closer to boarding time. (1/2) ^EC support: As such, our Gate Agents have the ability to offer Upgraded Boarding when available within one hour of departure. (2/2) ^EC customer: That makes sense. Wish your check in agent would have explained it that way. support: We're so sorry for your continued frustration. We hope you will give us another chance. ^SJ
summary: Customer is complaining about the poor service where they changed their flight and lost boarding position A to C and wouldn't let them $ for priority boarding during check in. Agent updates that their Gate agents have the ability to offer Upgraded boarding when available within one hour of departure and apologies for their continued frustration.

dialogue: customer: left my laptop on the flight down from Edinburgh. Your new lost property procedures are a shambles.  Nobody knows what to do and to have to wait 24 hours is shocking.  Seat 1a in club Europe.  Shocking support: Hi Craig, anything left on board that's found, is handed in to Lost Property at the airport. It can take over 24 hours to be logged 1/2 customer: I was a domestic flight so no security issues so why can‚Äôt it be sent directly from the aircraft to the lost property section which in 25 meters as the crow flys from where we disembarked.  I‚Äôm flying back now so a wasted day as NO presentation.  My fault but this new system is . customer: I was also sent from person to person as the new rules are confusing as well as being on hold for 1 hour at the baggage office.  In the end I drive back to LHR to try and retrieve it but with NO luck support: We're sorry this has caused you problems today, Craig. Unfortunately it's not always as simple as sending the item to lost property. It 1/2 support: has to be located and logged before we can reunite it with the passenger. You will need to continue to contact the airport directly. 2/2 customer: A teddy bear I understand but a laptop off a domestic flight in the club Europe cabin and a return flight the same day needs a quicker processing time.  Also to wait 1 hour on the phone and then they hang up is shocking.  Not a good switch BA. customer: ‚ÄúFound items can take up to 7 days to reach us from aircrafts‚Äù at what point do you go back to the old system.  My work are furious, meeting in london was a no go and now having to borrow one for a trip today. support: Hi Craig, we're sorry for the problems you've had contacting Lost Property, and for the inconvenience of being without your laptop. We hope you're reunited with it soon. ^Lindy customer: I now have my laptop back but it cost me a total of ¬£40 to have it sent back to Edinburgh. summary: Customer is complaining about the new lost property procedures where nobody knows what to do and has to wait for 24 hrs since they have left the laptop on the flight down from Edinburgh. Agent apologies for the problems they have with lost property and for the inconvenience of being without their laptop.

dialogue: customer: while exporting a PPro seq in AME - colors over saturated & 1 shot was too bright & washed out. Any thoughts?   support: Hi Clint, are colors exporting fine in PPro? dialogue: customer: Hey there, I have a package that‚Äôs been stuck in ZhengZhou, China since 11/15. Originally the date of delivery was 11/24. Then switched to 11/21. Now there is no information available. What is happening with my delivery? support: Hello, please click the link to DM us with your tracking and phone number. ^E.W.  customer: Since you‚Äôre not responding to my DM‚Äôs, I want to let you know here that I‚Äôm reporting this delay to the shipper. support: Customs is a government process that UPS has no control over. We have to wait for the packages to be released, the same as the customers. ^E.W.  customer: So it‚Äôs been over 24 hours. Still no delivery estimate and no progress. What is going on with this shipment? customer: Package was released over 48 hours ago. Still hasn‚Äôt moved. Delivery was scheduled for today, 11/21.   support: The package has been cleared, but has not resumed transit. Once it does, we will be able to have the package sent to the destination facility for delivery to you. We understand the importance of your package and appreciate your patience. ^TT customer: But my question is WHY hasn‚Äôt it resumed transit. No one has been able to answer this question for two days. Not helpful at all.  support: There is an Iphone hold up currently. If you do not want to wait I would advise contacting the shipper to see if there is another way you can possibly get it. ^LD  customer: This is response I got from  chat: I do not know why they referred you to us when they have your package and have access to whats going on with it. All of the shipping information that we provided to customers comes from UPS so they should have helped you with that. support: Our records indicate the package is in the process of being released by customs. We have no control on how long this can take, however, the package delivery date will be updated once the package is released. Please continue to track at  ^TV  customer: Your tracking page says ‚ÄúClearance completed.‚Äù It has since 11/19, 2 days ago. What is the discrepancy in your system? support: The package was released on Sunday, 11/19/17, however, the package can move without being scanned. The package still needs to reach the destination. Typically the scheduled delivery date would be today, 11/21, however, it has been delayed due to customs. ^TV customer: Man, you guys keep telling me different things. Now the package can move without being scanned? What a joke. dialogue: customer: any reason for the last minute cancellation of the 8:25 SUR to WAT?  support: Hello, on the previous journey, the train encounter a fault causing a delay to the next journey. But would be better if you ran the service you are supposed to. Isn‚Äôt that what your customers pay for?? support: I appreciate the frustration of the delays, I can assure you they are not intentional and we aim for passengers to be on time. ^AE customer: So when are we going to see the promised improvement in service and longer trains? support: Longer trains are already being introduced to suburban and Windsor routes. summary: The customer asks what was the reason for last minute cancellation of the 8:25 SUR to WAT and asks for detailed info about when improvements will be seen at stations other than Windsor. The agent informs that on the previous journey, the train encountered a fault causing a delay to the next journey, that is the reason the train ran fast and suggests to keep checking the website for future announcements.

dialogue:
customer: searching google for a PS4 highlighted your ¬£199.99 offer in store (500gb plus FIFA 18) Went to store to be told it is not a genuine offer. Can this be removed? Very misleading! support: Hi Mark. I'm so sorry for the disappointment caused by this. Can you confirm where you saw this offer online? As I'd like to investigate this further. Thank you. - Alisha. customer: Hi, open google, type in PS4 and it is top of the list for shopping on the right of the page customer:   support: Hi Mark, thanks for getting back in touch. It looks like this is through an outward link. As our direct site and stores are separate areas of the business with their own stock, promotions and prices can sometimes vary 1/2 support: Try having a look on our direct page.  Ty - Reece 2/2 customer: Not sure what the outward link signifies. Still looks like it is your offer. Could confuse other simpletons like me üôÇ support: Hi Mark, I'm sorry regarding this situation, allow us to elaborate. This is an offer we previously had as an online deal, as such some search engines will still contain cached results of our products and deals.

1/2 support: We therefore cannot be held responsible for any offers that aren't directly on our page as we have no control over cached versions of search results. Hope this makes sense, let us know if we can help further. - Thanks - David

2/2
summary: Customer is complaining that they found PS4 highlighted their $199.99 offer in store when searched in google, when they visited the store, they got to know that the offer was not genuine. Agent updates that this offer they had previously for an online deal and they are not responsible for any offers which are not directly from their own page.

dialogue: customer:  Not sure if incompetent and/or liars, but WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER. lies lies lies support:  Anything we can help with today, Ashton? ^MW customer:  Yes, been lied to over and over again by  staff over unused train tickets and refund.  support:  Can you please explain further? ^PA customer:  Yes (AGAIN!) Was told not to travel due to WC ML disruption and I would receive a full refund, sent tix - no refund. Wrote & complained - nothing, spoke online, was told to I would be contacted in 48-72 hours, again nothing! support:  Did you apply through your point of purchase because that is who should issue the refund. ^PA customer:  Well the point of purchase was Virgin Trains website! Followed the procedures told by your call centre (India) to send the tickets to VT (in Edinburgh) to receive refund. Then just ignored! support:  Can you please DM us with your booking reference and we'll have a look. ^PA customer:  Sorry, I'm keeping this public. I DM this last time and all I was told to do was go on the website and speak on the live chat on there. Wasted time on there explaining it AGAIN and was told I'd be recontacted - nothing! support:  I'm afraid we'd need to ask you some security questions for data protection so we can't do that publicly. ^PA customer:  Okay, fair enough, but I would assume you'll just do exactly the same as your colleagues did last week! *sigh* customer:  Wow, your call centre is really good! 03445565650 "Can't help you at all, phone another number" Passed round from pillar to post here! support:  I'm afraid you will have needed to check within a reasonable amount of time, it is now nearly 2 years since the journey date so nothing can be done for it I'm afraid. ^PA customer:  You are REALLY taking the mickey now! I did as I was asked, and not refunded! Disgusting way to treat your customers! support:  I'm afraid there isn't anything we can do I'm afraid as the tickets were not tracked there is no way to find them and a refund is not due. ^PA customer:  Even though I have a copy of the (unused) tickets? I know Virgin like to rip people off by claiming non-receipt therefore I kept hold of a copy of them.  Let me find them. support:  I'm afraid so, a copy won't suffice. ^PA customer:  Aha, it appears to be your unlucky day! In looking I actually found the tickets - I must have sent to copies to Edinburgh!

dialogue: customer: Please add support for other U2F capable browsers like Opera and Firefox (via plugin). Dropbox prompts for sms code, useless if no üì∂. U2F !=üì∂ dependent. support: Thanks again! We‚Äôve made a note of this and passed over your feedback to our Developers ‚úçÔ∏è customer: It's now October and it still doesn't work. Google 'sms 2fa insecure' to see why you should drop SMS 2FA and enable U2F in _all_ browsers. support: Hi there, we‚Äôll pass your suggestion onto our dev team. Just so you‚Äôre aware, Opera isn‚Äôt a supported browser for... 1/2 support: ...Dropbox.com. You can see the supported browsers at the following page:  2/2 customer: It's obvious Opera isn't supported. Don't hide behind this excuse, it's not the 90s anymore: 'best viewed in Netscape'. dialogue: customer: so I bought some greens to go with my healthy dinner, and I got an extra surprise...I had to throw all my food out   support: When growing our veg, we encourage our suppliers to use minimal pesticides as possible. dialogue:
customer: Been with AirBnB for 4+ years as traveler & superhost.  Booked on  for thanksgiving with parents, but listing was misleading (e.g., dumpster at front door, bad/dangerous condition).   
  support: Hi Mostafa, we apologize for any frustration. We've asked a member of our team to review your case and follow up with you asap. Please be on the lookout for their contact. Thank you. customer:  I've spent multiple hours speaking w/ CS team. Case manager disputes that listing is misleading & says it is good condition (whereas other 2 reps were also appalled at pics I sent).  Clearly case manager doesn't care abt customers, focused on not giving refund. customer:  Honestly, I am still shocked that this is even something I need to further pursue. I could hear the case manager struggling to say it is not a misleading post and disgusting apt, but he didn't want to issue refund and said it.  Pics again as a reminder of the quality of place.  customer:  AirBnB Policy: "If you are a Host, you are responsible for ensuring that the Accommodations you list on Airbnb meet minimum quality standards regarding access, adequacy of Listing description, safety, cleanliness"  

I guess exposed electrical outlets are not a safety issue?!?!  customer:  I suppose dumpsters at building entrance, holes in floor, rusted faucets and dirty bathroom vents fall within "minimum quality standards" for cleanliness?  customer:  Does picture on listing with amazing view vs. the actual view from living room of dumpster (see pics) fall within the "adequacy of Listing description"?!  Am I missing something? Host didn't follow multiple minimum quality items but u don't care since you got your money.  support: Hi Mostafa, a member of our team is currently reviewing the situation and will be following up shortly. We appreciate your patience during this process. Please feel free to DM us with any specific questions you might have in the meantime. customer: yeah, you said that yesterday & same case manager reached out with same (ridiculous) conclusions.  I disputed transaction with credit card company and they will follow up with you.  I can appreciate bad experiences happen, but your response has been really shocking!  support: We understand your frustration. Our dedicated team is currently reviewing the case once again and they will follow up with you as soon as they can. Thank you for your patience. customer:  AirBnB still not willing to refund.  Any self-respecting company would have issued a refund and apologized profusely given the dirty place, let alone the safety issue with exposed electrical outlets.  Pictures again to remind you of what AirBnB thinks is "acceptable"  support: We have issued our final decision on this matter. Please refer to the email thread that we have been corresponding with you. Rest assured your feedback has been recorded, Mostafa. customer: I have, but am unable to get in touch with the CS rep.  The final decision is unacceptable.  I can keep tweeting to let others know about ur company's horrible service - maybe they can learn from my experience and share pics of the disguisting place you guys think is acceptable.  customer: What exact feedback has been recorded?  The host STILL has his misleading picture of Union Square as the first pic on his rental units which actually overlook an alleyway with dumpsters.  If you haven't amended that, then you obv. don't care at all about user experience.
summary: Customer complaints about listing being misleaded. Agent assures customer that his feedback has been recorded.

dialogue: customer: I cancelled a payment to a scammy listing, the seller won‚Äôt communicate, and now it says I need to pay now. help? support: Hi Justin. I really think this listing is a scam and you should look into it. customer:  customer: I couldn‚Äôt request to cancel the transaction because it said I didn‚Äôt pay even though I did. The seller marked my order unpaid. support: Hey Justin. Thanks for getting back to us. We have already sent a report the relevant team but remember you can report the 1/2 support:  listing from the Report Item Link on the Page. However, you're still covered by our Buyer's Protection. Keep us posted. ^A2/2

dialogue: customer: Is there any reason your macOS app tells me *every* time I boot about ‚ÄúSmart Sync‚Äù getting pretty damn annoying. support: Hi Chris, could you let us know more about this notification? Is it appearing as a pop-up, or in the Dropbox desktop application? Please DM us a screenshot of the message so that we can investigate this matter further, thanks! customer: It is this, every time I reboot.  support: Hey again Chris, can we assume that you‚Äôve gone through the ‚ÄúLearn More‚Äù or do you always ‚ÄúClose‚Äù the notification announcement? Thanks in advance! customer: Have definitely clicked the learn more. Quite a few times. support: Hi again, you should be able to disable the notifications of the Dropbox desktop application using the Mac settings in the Notification tab to prevent further prompts in future. customer: I realise I can do that, I was kinda trying not to turn off the whole feature due to one notification recurring. support: Hi again, one more thing we‚Äôd like to check, if you click the Dropbox desktop application from the menu bar, the ‚ÄòNotifications / Recents‚Äô should appear, clicking Learn more from that area should dismiss it permanently.
summary: Customer is complaining about the dropbox which is popping up everytime they boot about smart sync. Agent updates that they can disable the notifications of the dropbox desktop application from the main menu bar, where the notification/recents will appear, by clicking learn more from that area will dismiss it permanently.

I have asked colleagues at Oxford to take a look on board when the train arrives. support: 2/3 They will contact me with an update which I can share with you tomorrow. support: 3/3 Please also make a report at  in case a passenger has taken it to hand in elsewhere. dialogue: customer: of 5p bags  only option is 10p Bag for Life. +Plastic in a BfL so more polution. But ‚¨ÜÔ∏è profits?üëèüèª  support: Following a successful trial we've decided to remove all single-use carrier bags, & instead offer our customers a new Bag for Life at 10p. support: During the trial, we found that our customers bought significantly fewer bags, with sales reduced by 25% in trial stores.2/6 support: The feedback we received was that our Bag for Life, which is made from 94% recycled plastic  helped them to move to re-usable bags. 3/6 support: The other great news is money from the new Bag for Life will go to continue to support thousands of community projects across the country! support: Customers can vote for their favourite local schemes in-store by picking up a blue token at the checkout. 5/6 support: We've already given more than ¬£33 million to over 6400 local community projects in the last 2 years! TY - Jayne 6/6 customer: Well done Tesco, Bravo!! Oh, except that is the law. And let‚Äôs not forget the 10% admin costs you kept - thats ¬£3.4m  customer: How much though? Law different for BfL compared to single use. So you will ultimately profit from this move. Yes? customer: But you‚Äôre now able to profit on the remaining 75% of sales.  Worse net effect on landfill due to heavier BfL.. profit drives this decision
summary: The customer saying that the plastic in a Bfl is so more pollution and now the company is able to profit on remaining 75% of sales. The agent is replying that they are trying to remove all single use carrier bags and offering customers a bag at 10p.

dialogue: customer: How are you still issuing paper vouchers redeemable by mail only? Malte, Manila 1004  M-F 830a-530p. customer: ...not to mention the voucher was for a flight you canceled for mechanical issues & didn't compensate the full price as per regulations customer: Will they accept the voucher there? summary: Customer is complaining how can they issue paper vouchers which is redeemable only by mail. Agent updates that for some instances they need to issue paper vouchers and can use the voucher at the given address where the voucher need to bring in person in order to use it.

dialogue:
customer: got a friendly reminder from  support my bill is due. 

Also a friendly reminder I should downgrade. I‚Äôve never gotten 1gbps down. Why should I pay for it? support: Is this for your Verizon residential or Verizon wireless mobile?

^ADP customer: Residential, FiOS. But I‚Äôve had the issue before. Your speed test tool says I do, every other speed test tool says I don‚Äôt. support: We only recognize our speed test site as it was designed to work with our service. What speeds are you getting on our site?
^TXA customer: I‚Äôve never gotten less than 988mbps down on your site, even when I very clearly am not getting that. It is an unreliable source, IMO. customer: My internet is fine now. It‚Äôs just that when I do have real issues, your tools report no problem. It‚Äôs very hard for me to gauge/troubleshoot/get help if the prognosis is ‚Äúwe see nothing wrong.‚Äù support: Ok, the main thing is if you were able to directly connect a computer to your router with an ethernet cord and run the test at  we would then see an accurate speed test. 
^ADP customer: I really don‚Äôt want to seem unreasonable, but none of my computers have ethernet cables and haven‚Äôt for like 4 years. customer: It‚Äôs fine. I am experiencing no issues now. 

I just want to relay the feedback that make your speed test tool shouldn‚Äôt be the end all, be all because it *is* inaccurate sometimes. support: Any device that is not connected directly to ethernet  and running on Wifi would be susceptible to  interference, which could lower the results. Our test shows not only what the device is getting with the interference , it also shows what speeds the router is getting. 
^TXA
summary: The customer is asking why he has to pay the bill since he never got 1gbps down and also he is saying that tool is not showing the proper results and reflects no issues even he is facing real issues. Agent replying that if computer directly connected to router it would show  accurate speed in internet.

dialogue:
customer: How do I set my Macbook Pro's resolution to 1280x720 without attaching a 2nd monitor? 13" Mid 2014 with Sierra support: Try setting that by following this article: 

Let us know if this helps. customer: I have read a couple of these kinds of articles, but I want this to work without having to attach a second monitor. I just want to set the resolution and then record my screen. And then upload to Youtube. support: Check these steps out from the article: 
Set the resolution for the primary display: Choose Apple menu > System Preferences, click Displays, then click Display. Pick Scaled, then select one of the options. After Scaled, you should see the resolution you want. customer: In Scaled I can set the following resolutions: 1024x640, 1280x800, 1440x900, 1680x1050. support: We missed that you were looking for 1280 x 720. We can get you to that resolution. Press and hold the Option key on your keyboard while you click on the Scaled option in the Display Setting. This will open up other options for you. Click 1280 x 720 here. customer: That button does nothing when I click it. It's just a dummy button. customer: All those hidden options and buttons work when a second monitor is attached, but I don't always have access to an extra monitor. And also: that's just clumsy. In Windows this is no problem BTW. support: Pressing the button on its own will not do anything. However, if you press and hold Option and then click the little bubble to the immediate left of the word "Scaled", you should see the other options appear. customer: It won't show other options. It will only show the 4 standard options. And this "Recognize Monitors" button doesn't do anything either. support: Okay. Let's move to DM and we can continue there.
summary: Customer asking that how to set his macbook pro's resolution  to 1280*720 without attaching a 2nd monitor and also set the resolution and record his screen. Agent replying that  try setting by using this url and also  to set the resolution   for primary display choose apply menu & get system  preferences and then click display.

dialogue: customer: The latest update to Windows 10 is causing my Dell Inspiron 17 with i7 CPU and 16 Gb ram to freeze, why!? support: Hi. Let's sort this out. I‚Äôm surprised by that as I only use it once every couple of months to back up my computer and have only had it for two years. I‚Äôll try the things you‚Äôve suggested, thanks! If it‚Äôs corrupted can I re-format it at all? customer: It's connected directly to the USB port but still shows in disk management when it's unplugged. Can I do anything else? I don't mind losing everything that's on there. support: Did you ever set up a password protected "Secret Zone" using the software that came with your M3? The drive should disappear from Disk Management if the drive is not installed on a USB port. Does Disk 1 show even after a reboot when the M3 drive is not installed? Let us know, customer: No I didn‚Äôt. It did disappear, sorry I was getting confused! Disk 1 reappears when I plug the hard drive back in. I think it‚Äôs corrupted beyond repair unless you have any other solutions? support: Can you initialize the drive by right clicking within the box that indicates the drive is not initialized? If disk cannot be initialized, you can try Diskpart but be careful using this to make sure the correct disk is chosen  Both answers will erase data customer: I‚Äôve tried the diskpart solution but sadly that won‚Äôt let me initialise the drive after that eitherüò©üò©. support: Given your description, if the drive will not initialize no matter what computer/port is tried, and diskpart also does not work, then the drive may be nonfunctional. Check your warranty/return options here  customer: Thank you very much for your help, I really appreciate it!
summary: Customer is complaining about the corrupted external hard disk. Agent states that the drive may be nonfunctional.

dialogue: customer: Where do you stand on  ? Have you expressed that to the FCC? What are your plans if  is repealed? support: At Cox, we are committed to providing an open Internet experience. We do not block, throttle, or otherwise interfere with customers‚Äô desire to go where they want on the Internet. -Nichole customer: Thank you for your reply. Will you allow paid fast lanes or any other paid incentives? The question truly is will you change any of your current practices to take advantage of your consumers? support: Hi, Cox never will, nor ever has made any changes with the explicit intent to deceive our customers.  Please know our core value at Cox is to provide our customers with exceptional service for the best value - it's what we've always done and will continue to do!  -Carol (1/2) support: Thanks for reaching out to our Social Media Team - should you have any additional concerns we're available 24/7 to assist.  Thanks, -Carol (2/2)  customer: So, have you supported net neutrality staying in place or have you supported its repeal? Where does your company officially stand? What stands to change if it is repealed? Ideally, if it is repealed, you wouldn't have to change any of your practices, correct? customer: Still waiting on that reply of your official stance, whenever you get around to it?  support: Cox has every incentive to remain committed to the principles of an open Internet as we realize the importance our customers place on having access to the content of their choice. Read more at  Thank you. -Lindsey customer: Thank you for the reply and the link. However, a couple of questions: "Reestablishing ‚Äòlight-touch‚Äô regulation will return a level of certainty for consumer protections." The reason we're against the repeal of  is because we don't feel like we will be protected 1/ customer: if it is repealed. How does a "light-touch" protect us from what ISPs have done in the past that led to ? Also, "We call on Congress to use its unquestioned authority to enact bipartisan Net Neutrality legislation." It may not be bipartisan, but we have 2/ customer:  laws right now that are not broken. We, as consumers, have ZERO reason to believe that this will benefit us. I would like to hear concrete examples of ways this will benefit us. No responses like, "It will bring innovation," etc. No vagueness, what gets better?
summary: Customer is enquiring about the repealing of net neutrality and reestablishment of light-touch regulation for consumer protections. Agent states that they haven't made any changes with the intent to deceive customers and have realized the importance of customers content choice.

We will try and make room in the cabin when possible but this cannot be guaranteed. 2/2 ^L customer: Well, it‚Äôs just never been policy before ‚Äî as far as I know ‚Äî that guitars are outright not permitted in the cabin. 1/4 customer: If I bring a guitar in a soft case (so that it can be stowed in an overhead) and it is checked, there‚Äôs a high damage risk in the hold 2/4 customer: But if I bring a guitar in a hard case, it‚Äôs definitely going to get checked into the hold ‚Äî so then I risk damage from baggage handling 3/4 customer: It‚Äôs a catch 22, and it makes me worry if I can travel on BA with a guitar for work, as I need the instrument intact at the other end üòï 4/4 support: Hi Antonio, we understand your concerns. As previously advised, we will try and allow it to be stored in the cabin but it cannot support: be guaranteed. We've passed on your comments for consideration next time this policy is reviewed. 2/2 ^L customer: Thanks. I‚Äôve been on E170s where the ground crew have said, ‚ÄúThe flight‚Äôs full, no way it‚Äôll fit‚Äù, then there‚Äôs been a dozen empty overheads support: Hi Antonio, this is disappointing to hear. We understand how important it is to keep musical instruments safe during travel and we'll support: do all we can to make sure all our staff are fully trained on this this and understand when to make allowances. 2/2 ^L
summary: Customer is telling that the he was informed during the check in that guitar should be carried out in hard case but not informed earier. Agent is replying that they will try to allow it to store in cabin for that particular travel.

dialogue: customer: My Lumia 950 is constantly uploading, but I have no idea what. No OneDrive/backup. Busy all day, battery draining. Any idea? support: Hi, Alexander. We're here for you. For us to isolate your concern, can you tell us if your phone is connected to WiFi? If yes, let's turn off the auto sync. Go here to find out how:  customer: Did that, switched off auto sync OneDrive and all backup functions. Phone is still uploading. I run the latest version I believe.  customer: Btw it does it with both WiFi and metered connection, even though I restricted background usage and hardly allow usage of mobile connection customer: Eh, are you still here for me? support: Still here, Alex. We suggest that you try to reset your device using the steps on this link:  Start off with a soft reset, then back up your device before proceeding with a hard reset. This allows us to determine if the issue is with the OS. customer: The soft one didn't help. The hard one I am a bit afraid for. Are messages included in a backup? Don't want to loose stuff obviously. support: Thank you for giving it a try. The messages, settings, apps, and photos are included when you create a back up. You can visit this link for creating a back up on your phone:  Let us know if you have any questions!
summary: Customer is complaining that his Lumia 950 is constantly uploading something even after restricting background usage with both WiFi and metered connection. Agent suggests to reset the device by following the steps on the provided link and requests to back up the device before proceeding with a hard reset.
